name: Erugo World Coin
description: To overcome the limitation of previous mass-type Metaverse platforms that only focus on the value of digital assets and transaction volumes, ERUGO WORLD aims to be the sustainable Metaverse platform which connects with reality by providing valuable services to our investors. The Metaverse that ERUGO WORLD pursue follows 4 principles. 1. Remove entry barriers to create a place anyone can invest. 2. Build an economic ecosystem which operates and develops on its own. 3. Target and aim to build a powerful linkage with reality. 4. Activate the economic ecosystem via collaboration with various business uits. ERUGO WORLD with ‘ERUGO WORLD Ecosystem Model’ which connects Metaverse, business and user based on blockchain pursues sustainable growth via an independent economic ecosystem.
